Medium-sized projection screen to one side (to the left of

Computer with CD/DVD and floppy drives as well as USB ports
(for memory sticks).  The computer runs Windows XP and is
connected to the internet.  PowerPoint and PDF viewing software is
installed.  Computer output is simultaneously displayed on a VDU for the presenter as well as projected onto the main screen
Alternatively the LCD projector (and VDU display) can be
connected to a laptop.  Mac users please bring a Mac to VGA
connector. The resolution of the projector is 480 x 640 - this
occasionally causes problems with laptops that are set to output at a
higher resolution.  Please know how to adjust the output resolution of
your laptop if you intend to use it as the source of your
presentation.  If required the laptop could be connected into the
internet (either wirelessly of through an Ethernet link) for a
presentation.  Please let us know in advance if this is required.
